org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.dropout

Class CudnnDropoutHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BaseCudnnHelper
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.dropout.CudnnDropoutHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DropoutHelper

    public class CudnnDropoutHelper
extends BaseCudnnHelper
implements DropoutHelper
    CuDNN dropout helper Note that for repeatability between calls (for example, for gradient checks), we need to do two things: (a) set the ND4J RNG seed (b) clear the rngStates field
